SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_COUNTRY_QUOTATYPE
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Determines the quota type for a particular country
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_COUNTRY_QUOTATYPE ( @countryID uniqueidentifier -- Country Extension ID (same as the Constituent ID) of the country to check the quota type for ) returns tinyint with execute as caller as begin declare @quotaTypeCode tinyint = 99 select @quotaTypeCode = QUOTATYPECODE from dbo.USR_COUNTRYEXTENSION where ID = @countryID
return @quotaTypeCode end
